Let’s get fat together !

Diet? What is that? Not in my vocabulary…

No, just kidding (unfortunately)

But anyway, it’s not because you’re on diet that you can’t eat some fat food sometines…
Nothing’s better than cheese, sauce and cream, even though we have to run two kilometers after we eat them (as if we were going to run hahaha).

To be more clear, nothing is better than eating fat food when you feel sad, depressed, angry, or whatever.
I mean nothing is better than eating fat food, but it is even better in those situations.

So for you, ladies and gentlemen, I have decided to share my worst but betst fat recipes, hopefully you’ll feel good after eating them (or even better than you were before).

Tchuss
